requirement_summary: Obligation to make data accessible to users
description: Documented procedure for making data generated by connected products or related services accessible to users, including technical means, formats, and timeliness of access
auditor_questions: How do you make product-generated data accessible to users?
What technical means are provided for users to access their data?
How do you ensure data is provided without undue delay and in a comprehensive format?
Show me evidence that users are informed about what data is generated before purchase

maturity_levels.basic: Basic data export functionality available, manual process for user requests
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated data access portal, structured data formats, real-time access capabilities
maturity_levels.advanced: API-based continuous data access, machine-readable formats, proactive data delivery to users

requirement_summary: Right of users to access and use data
description: Log of all user data access requests showing request details, response times, data formats provided, and any refusals with justifications
auditor_questions: Show me the log of user data access requests for the past year
What is your average response time for data access requests?
Have you refused any data access requests and on what grounds?
How do you ensure the data provided is of the same quality as available to the data holder?

maturity_levels.basic: Manual tracking of access requests, basic logging
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated request tracking system, SLA monitoring, structured response process
maturity_levels.advanced: Self-service data access portal, real-time fulfillment, automated quality checks

requirement_summary: Right to share data with third parties
description: Procedure governing how users can request data sharing with third parties, including verification of third-party identity, technical implementation, and safeguards against misuse
retention_period: Duration of data sharing arrangement + 5 years
auditor_questions: How do users exercise their right to share data with third parties?
What safeguards are in place to prevent misuse by third parties?
How do you verify the identity and legitimacy of third-party data recipients?
Show me evidence that data sharing does not compromise trade secrets or security

maturity_levels.basic: Manual data sharing process, basic third-party verification
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated data sharing workflows, contractual safeguards, audit trails
maturity_levels.advanced: API-based data portability, automated compliance checks, real-time monitoring of third-party usage

requirement_summary: Obligations of third parties receiving data
description: Standard agreements and controls ensuring third parties only use data for the agreed purpose, do not develop competing products, and implement appropriate security measures
auditor_questions: Show me your standard agreements with third-party data recipients
How do you ensure third parties only use data for the agreed purpose?
What controls prevent third parties from developing competing products?
How do you enforce data deletion requirements when the sharing arrangement ends?

maturity_levels.basic: Standard contractual terms exist for third-party data recipients
maturity_levels.intermediate: Contractual compliance monitoring, periodic audits of third-party usage
maturity_levels.advanced: Technical enforcement of usage restrictions, automated compliance verification, real-time usage analytics

requirement_summary: Unfair contractual terms relating to data access
description: Assessment of contractual terms related to data access and use to ensure they are not unfairly imposed on micro, small, or medium enterprises, including review of unilateral clauses and liability limitations
auditor_questions: How do you assess whether contractual terms for data access are fair?
Show me your review process for identifying potentially unfair terms
Have you identified and remediated any unfair contractual terms?
How do you ensure compliance with the fairness test under Article 13?

maturity_levels.basic: Legal review of key contracts for obvious unfair terms
maturity_levels.intermediate: Systematic fairness assessment across all data-related contracts, remediation tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated contract analysis tools, proactive fairness design, regular benchmarking against market standards

description: Documented procedure for resolving disputes related to data access and sharing, including access to certified dispute settlement bodies and internal escalation mechanisms
auditor_questions: What is your procedure for handling disputes related to data access or sharing?
Have you identified certified dispute settlement bodies for escalation?
Show me records of any data-related disputes and their resolution
How do you ensure dispute resolution is accessible and affordable for SMEs?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic complaint process documented, awareness of dispute settlement bodies
maturity_levels.intermediate: Formal internal dispute resolution process, trained staff, documented case handling
maturity_levels.advanced: Integrated dispute management system, proactive dispute prevention, analytics on dispute patterns

description: Documented procedure enabling customers to switch between data processing services including cloud, edge, and similar services, covering data portability, transition periods, and functional equivalence
auditor_questions: Show me your documented switching procedure for data processing services
What is the maximum transition period you support for customer switching?
How do you ensure data portability during the switching process?
What charges apply during the switching period and are they compliant with the phase-out timeline?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic data export capabilities, documented switching process
maturity_levels.intermediate: Standardised data formats, assisted migration tools, clear switching timelines
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated migration tools, zero-downtime switching, functional equivalence testing

description: Technical documentation covering open interfaces, interoperability standards, data format specifications, and APIs that enable switching between data processing services
auditor_questions: What open interfaces and APIs do you provide for data portability?
Show me your technical specifications for data export formats
How do you ensure compatibility with common industry standards?
What testing do you perform to verify successful data migration?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic data export in common formats, API documentation available
maturity_levels.intermediate: Open standards-based APIs, migration testing tools, interoperability validation
maturity_levels.advanced: Full API compatibility suite, automated migration validation, continuous interoperability testing

requirement_summary: International transfer safeguards for non-personal data
description: Policy and safeguards for preventing unlawful international access to and transfer of non-personal data held in the EU, including risk assessments and contractual protections
auditor_questions: What safeguards do you have against unlawful international government access to data?
Show me your risk assessment for international data transfers
How do you handle requests from third-country authorities for EU-held data?
What contractual measures protect against non-EU jurisdictional access?

maturity_levels.basic: Policy exists covering international data transfer restrictions
maturity_levels.intermediate: Risk assessments performed, contractual safeguards in place, staff trained
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated data residency controls, continuous monitoring of access patterns, legal response playbooks

requirement_summary: Public sector access to privately held data in exceptional need
artifact_name: Public Sector Data Request Handling Procedure
description: Procedure for handling data access requests from public sector bodies in cases of exceptional need such as public emergencies, including validation, proportionality assessment, and response protocols
auditor_questions: How do you validate and process data requests from public sector bodies?
What is your process for assessing the proportionality of public sector requests?
Show me records of any public sector data requests and how they were handled
How do you ensure compliance with conditions and limitations under Article 31?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic procedure exists for receiving and responding to public sector requests
maturity_levels.intermediate: Formal validation workflow, legal review process, response tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated request processing, real-time legal assessment, secure data delivery channels
